body_html:
Or would you see this as the students' job? I believe this is info which the students/team could provide, if we really want to make the application non-editable by the coaches and have a hands-off approach

@alicetragedy Yes, I meant this as a students' job. No coaches' mingling in the application draft form.

body:
> Or would you see this as the students' job? I believe this is info which the students/team could provide, if we really want to make the application non-editable by the coaches and have a hands-off approach

@alicetragedy Yes, I meant this as a students' job.  No coaches' mingling in the application draft form.
